meanings.definition: To keep or store (a vehicle) in a garage.
meanings.sent1: I always make sure to garaged my car to protect it from the weather.
meanings.sent2: She garaged her motorcycle every night to keep it safe.
meanings.sent3: The car felt happy being garaged away from the rain.
meanings.sent4: His dreams of success were garaged in his determination to work hard.
meanings.sent5: The idea garaged in his mind, waiting for the right moment to be put into action.

meanings.sent1: Their garaged house had enough space for two cars.
meanings.sent2: The garaged property was highly sought after in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The garaged home stood out with its well-maintained exterior.
meanings.sent4: She had a garaged driveway that made parking convenient.
meanings.sent5: The garaged building provided ample storage for all their belongings.
